alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Juniata; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ADAMS...CENTRAL JUNIATA...CENTRAL PERRY AND CENTRAL CUMBERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Royal to near Ardentsville. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Locations impacted include... C Colonel Denning State Park, Biglerville, Arendtsville, Mifflintown, Port Royal, Mifflin, and Bendersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
